en_definition: substances used especially by women to make their faces look more attractive, or used by actors to change their appearance
perfect; most suitable
zh_definition: 完美的；理想的；最合适的

en_definition: wide
able to see things clearly only if they are very close
(of a person, an idea, a comment, etc.) not showing serious thought, feelings, etc. about something
typical, usual or ordinary; what you would expect
the act of presenting somebody/something in a particular way; something that shows or describes something
zh_definition: 表现；描述；描绘；表现形式

en_definition: to cut hair from the skin, especially the face, using a razor
all the people born and living at about the same time
a type of solid mineral substance that is usually hard and shiny and that heat and electricity can travel through, for example tin, iron and gold
to make something longer, wider or looser, for example by pulling it; to become longer, etc. in this way
(of people or their behaviour) attractive and showing a good sense of style
strange or unusual
to make it possible for somebody to do something
to show signs of something, especially a quality or feeling
zh_definition: 显示，显露，表现（尤指特性或情感）

en_definition: (of a group of similar things) to be different from each other in size, shape, etc.
to be well around something/somebody
the state of being male or female
the words that come just before and after a word, phrase or statement and help you to understand its meaning
the fact of being male or female, especially when considered with reference to social and cultural differences, not differences in biology
zh_definition: 性别（尤指社会和文化差异，而非生理差异）

en_definition: a general direction in which a situation is changing or developing
a job or profession
the building of a university or college and the land around them
the various aspects of a person’s character that combine to make them different from other people
connected with or located on the outside of something/somebody
the feeling of happiness that you have when something unpleasant stops or does not happen
something that you feel you have to do because it is your moral or legal responsibility
the physical or mental energy that you need to do something; something that takes a lot of energy
to pay no attention to something
a children’s game in which one player covers his or her eyes while the other players hide and then tries to find them
a part of a tree that grows out from the main stem and on which leaves, flowers and fruit grow
a large amount or quantity of something
considered separately rather than as part of a group
a regular arrangement of lines, shapes, colours, etc. as a design on material, carpets, etc.
(formal) to see or notice something/somebody
all the time; repeatedly
to swim underwater wearing breathing equipment, collecting or looking at things
a group or type of people or things that are similar in a particular way
an idea, a feeling or an opinion that you get about somebody/something, or that somebody/something gives you
to change or behave in a particular way as a result of or in response to something
zh_definition: 起反应；（对......）作出反应；回应

en_definition: a part of a newspaper or magazine which appears regularly and deals with a particular subject or is written by a particular writer
example of something
the extra force given to a word or phrase when spoken, especially in order to show importance
a set of clothes made of the same cloth, including a jacket and trousers/pants or a skirt
to be real; to be present in a place or situation
a person, an object, an event, etc. that represents a more general quality or situation
several; different
zh_definition: 各种不同的；各种各样的

en_definition: a marriage ceremony, and the meal or party that usually follows it
to make objects, pattern, etc. by cutting away material from wood or stone
made or formed in a very careful and detailed way
connected with real situations rather than with ideas or theories
zh_definition: 实际的；真实的；客观存在的

en_definition: operations that improve your appearance after you have been injured, or because you want to look more attractive
